It's that time again, the second game night is upon us! I had trouble finding enough games this week, so suggestions are appreciated!

This weeks games for vote are:


 http://i.imgur.com/VjPA1.png 
  King Arthur's Gold  is a great cross of Terraria and TF2, classes, siege weaponry, building, physics-based destruction and much more. There is also some strategic elements that encourage teamwork! It was my favorite game from last weeks voting and deserves a second chance.
Official Website  
Gameplay  

 http://i.imgur.com/joZeA.png 
  Celestial Impact  is an amazing, classic fast-paced shooter, with a twist. You are on a asteroid hurdling through space, and you have a gun that can completely manipulate your environment. Pretty great game!
Official Website  
Gameplay   (outdated, game is a lot better than this video makes it look)

 http://i.imgur.com/A8Kfe.png 
  Action Half-Life 2  is an over-the-top shooter based on the over-the-top 70's and 80's movies. Listen to Tank by The Seatbelts when you play this and you will complete the experience, also it has diving, dual pistols and sweet 'staches.
Official Website  
Gameplay  

Suggest games if you don't see anything you won't like playing, it's hard finding free multiplayer games that aren't shooters, maybe next week I might add games that cost money such as Magicka, also if you are reading this, this game night may have a surprise!

Let's do Dom a favor and vote for King Arthur's gold. Shall we?
not to mention that it looks quite fun.
